long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DashDot: Your Personal Focus Assistant 🚀

DashDot is the perfect companion for staying productive and focused in a fast-paced world. ✨ Seamlessly blending a sleek to-do list ✅ with the Pomodoro technique ⏳ and immersive ambient sounds 🎧, DashDot is more than just a productivity tool—it’s your personal focus assistant. 🧠

Whether you're tackling daily tasks 📋 or deep-diving into complex projects 🛠️, DashDot helps you stay on top of it all with a clean, minimalist interface 🧼 that keeps the clutter away.

Features 🛠️:
• Effortless To-Do List 📝: Organize tasks, set priorities, and track your progress with a simple and intuitive layout.
• Pomodoro Timer 🍅: Break your work into productive intervals with customizable timers, perfectly balanced for focus and rest.
• Ambient Sounds 🎶: Create the perfect working atmosphere with a variety of ambient sounds, from rain 🌧️ to coffee shop ☕ vibes—designed to help you concentrate.
• Stretch Reminders 🧍‍♂️: Take care of yourself with gentle reminders to move and stretch during long work sessions.
• Customizable Settings 🎛️: Tailor your Pomodoro sessions, sound preferences, and reminders to fit your work style.
• Distraction-Free Design 🚫: The minimalist interface is crafted to reduce distractions and maximize focus.
• Task Status Tracking 📊: Add statuses to your tasks using built-in defaults or create custom statuses that suit your workflow.

Try DashDot now and turn chaos into checkmarks! ✅

What’s New (Version 2.0):
• Task Status Management:
    • Assign default or custom statuses to your tasks for better organization and tracking🐾.
    • Create personalized workflows tailored to your needs, from "Polishing" 💅 to "On Hold" 🛑 and more.
